sys_soap_message_function.envelope: <SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:m="http://www.alarmpoint.com/webservices/schema" xmlns:SOAP-ENV="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:SOAP-ENC="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" SOAP-ENV:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <SOAP-ENV:Body> <UpdateCompany xmlns="http://www.alarmpoint.com/webservices/schema"> <!-- nillable--> <user xsi:type="xsd:string">String</user> <!-- nillable--> <password xsi:type="xsd:string">String</password> <!-- nillable--> <clientTimestamp xsi:type="xsd:string">String</clientTimestamp> <!-- nillable--> <clientIP xsi:type="xsd:string">String</clientIP> <!-- nillable--> <clientOSUser xsi:type="xsd:string">String</clientOSUser> <!-- nillable--> <company xsi:type="xsd:string">String</company> <!-- nillable--> <oldCompany xsi:type="xsd:string">String</oldCompany> <!-- nillable--> <newCompany xsi:type="xsd:string">String</newCompany> <!-- nillable--> <description xsi:type="xsd:string">String</description> <!-- nillable--> <state xsi:type="xsd:string">String</state> <!-- nillable--> <callInNumber xsi:type="xsd:string">String</callInNumber> <!-- nillable--> <clusters xsi:type="m:SoapClusterList"> <!-- Array[] nillable--> <cluster xsi:type="m:SoapClusterItem"> <!-- nillable--> <name xsi:type="xsd:string">String</name> </cluster> </clusters> </UpdateCompany> </SOAP-ENV:Body> </SOAP-ENV:Envelope>
